get.description: Get all organizations the authenticated user is a member of

200.description: Returns array of organizations with member count and role

post.description: Create a new organization with the authenticated user as OWNER

get.description: Get detailed information about an organization including members

200.description: Returns organization details with members list

patch.description: Update organization information. Requires ADMIN or OWNER role. Quota fields require SUPER_ADMIN.

delete.description: Soft delete an organization (30-day recovery period). Requires OWNER role.

get.description: Get all members of an organization with their roles. Requires MEMBER role or higher.

403.description: Not a member of this organization

post.description: Invite a user to join the organization by email. Requires ADMIN or OWNER role.

patch.description: Change a member's role in the organization. Requires ADMIN or OWNER role.

delete.description: Remove a member from the organization. Requires ADMIN or OWNER role. Cannot remove the last OWNER.

get.description: Get all teams the authenticated user is a member of within this organization

200.description: Returns array of teams with member count and role

get.summary: List my teams in this organization

post.description: Create a new team within the organization. Requires Organization ADMIN or OWNER role. Creator becomes team MAINTAINER.

409.description: Team slug already exists in this organization

get.description: Get detailed information about a team including members

200.description: Returns team details with members list

patch.description: Update team name and description. Requires team MAINTAINER role.

delete.description: Delete a team. Requires team MAINTAINER role. All team members and permissions will be removed.

get.description: Get all members of a team with their roles. Requires team MEMBER role or higher.

403.description: Not a member of this team

post.description: Add an organization member to the team by email. Requires team MAINTAINER role. User must already be a member of the organization.

400.description: User is not a member of the organization

409.description: User is already a member of this team

patch.description: Change a team member role. Requires team MAINTAINER role.

delete.description: Remove a member from the team. Requires team MAINTAINER role. Cannot remove the last MAINTAINER.

get.description: Get all projects the team has access to with permission levels. Requires team MEMBER role or higher.

403.description: Not a member of this team

post.description: Grant team access to a project with specified permission level. Requires team MAINTAINER role. Project must belong to the same organization.

400.description: Project does not belong to the same organization

patch.description: Change the permission level for a project. Requires team MAINTAINER role.

delete.description: Remove team access to a project. Requires team MAINTAINER role.

startPoint.description: Start point (commit SHA or branch name)

path.description: File path relative to repository root

branch.description: Branch name to commit to (will be created if not exists)

files.description: Files to add/modify in this commit

authorName.description: Author name (optional, defaults to current user)

authorEmail.description: Author email (optional, defaults to current user)

slug.description: URL-friendly slug (2-50 characters, lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens only)

OrgRole.description: Role to assign to the member

email.description: Email address of the user to invite

role.description: Role to assign to the member
New role to assign to the member

slug.description: URL-friendly unique identifier for the team within the organization

organizationSlug.description: Organization slug to which this team belongs

description.example: Responsible for all frontend development tasks

TeamRole.description: Role to assign to the team member

email.description: Email address of the user to add to the team

role.description: Role to assign to the team member
New role to assign to the team member

MemberRole.description: Role level to grant to the team

projectId.description: Project ID to assign permission for

role.description: Role level to grant to the team
New role level for the team

files.description: List of changed files with diffs

reviewers.description: List of reviewers with their latest review state

allowed.description: Whether the PR can be merged

reason.description: Reason if merge is not allowed

hasChangeRequests.description: Whether there are active change requests
